channel.title: Home area -please read -
channel.description:
Hi, i am using the rune-kingodm source and the home is at yanille. I wan to change it so, does anyone have anygood areas that i can use for home. Could you please tell me the coords for is
Also the home has to have rea for shops..
Sorry bu could you also tell me some good coords for a new skilling area
Would be great if you could help -Tom

item.title: Home area -please read -
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:15, topic:321476”][quote author=david7147 link=topic=417931.msg3072223#msg3072223 date=1261594610]

david7147, don’t you have anything better to do then just sit around criticizing everyones post?
go do something instead of telling people stuff that doesn’t even help them! This is “Server Help” and he is ASKING FOR HELP. So this IS the board for this. durrrrrrrrr.
I agree with the yungbubba, the duel arena. that would be pretty cool.

Infact, it’s the wrong section, this should go in the questions section, anyways, others have posted/asked suggestions in this board, so…

True, thats why people should stop giving them “answers”. They should go find it themselves, don’t you agree?

yes, and no. people have posted suggestions in here befor, why arn’t they aloud now?

Never said they weren’t allowed, god knows I have no power in any of this. I’m just saying, I’m tired of seeing people saying things like this, waisting there time and others asking this, when they could be off finding this on there own.
[/quote]

I get sick of seeing portwarding threads every day, but you don’t see me flame on their thread.[/quote]
This fight is pointless, he has an “answer” so end of topic.

Read full topic

item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

Mage Bank?? 2541 4716
Catherby Bank: 2809 3440
Green Dubgeon Place: 2531 10142 (yes the Y is 5 #s)
Desert Kingdom: 3292 3168
Desert Bank: 3271 3167
Duel Arena: 3367 3267 (that or on top balcony)
